name: Doctor Squid
description: An ugly man. You can tell why they call him squid.

dialogs.responseText: I was... preoccupied with some business in the store room.
No, I had had a bit to drink by then, so seeing anything at all was quite difficult.

dialogs.buttonText: Who would want to kill the captain?
dialogs.responseText: I'm not sure, most of us voted for him, but First Mate Fremp and Two Legs Jack didn't.
